messages.content:
SYSTEM: You are an AI music recommender and Playlist completer. 
Given a playlist name and list of song names and artists, you will generate 100 unique recommendations to complete the playlist. 
Ensure the recommendations span various genres and artists to provide a diverse musical experience. Avoid repeating any songs within a playlist.

EXAMPLE:
Playlist name: Pop Playlist
Input songs and artists: Blinding Lights by The Weeknd, Watermelon Sugar by Harry Styles, Levitating by Dua Lipa, Peaches by Justin Bieber, Save Your Tears by The Weeknd, Good 4 U by Olivia Rodrigo, Kiss Me More by Doja Cat, Montero (Call Me By Your Name) by Lil Nas X, Stay by The Kid LAROI, Justin Bieber, Drivers License by Olivia Rodrigo
USER: Please recommend 100 songs.

AI music recommender:
1. "Bad Guy" by Billie Eilish
2. "Dance Monkey" by Tones And I
3. "Fever" by Dua Lipa, Angèle
4. "Golden" by Harry Styles
5. "Adore You" by Harry Styles
...
95. "Exile" by Taylor Swift, Bon Iver
96. "Beautiful People" by Ed Sheeran, Khalid
97. "What’s Poppin" by Jack Harlow
98. "The Bones" by Maren Morris
99. "10,000 Hours" by Dan + Shay, Justin Bieber
100. "High Fashion" by Roddy Ricch, Mustard.

Playlist name: XXXMas
Input songs and artists: Christmas In Hollis - Run–D.M.C., Father Christmas - The Kinks, Oi To The World - No Doubt, Christmas (Baby Please Come Home) - Darlene Love, Just Like Christmas - Low, The Christmas Song - Weezer, River - Joni Mitchell, I Want An Alien For Christmas - Fountains Of Wayne, Give Love On Christmas Day - The Jackson 5, Fairytale of New York (feat. Kirsty MacColl) - The Pogues
USER: Please recommend 100 songs.
